dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 679 IH: To amend the Agricultural Research, Extension, and Education Reform Act of 1998 to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to waive the matching funds requirement under the specialty crop research initiative, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Schrier (for herself, Mr. Newhouse, Mr. Larsen of Washington, Mrs. Rodgers of Washington, Ms. Lee of California, Ms. Perez, Ms. Bonamici, Ms. DelBene, Ms. Slotkin, Mr. Khanna, Mr. Harder of California, Mr. Carbajal, Mr. Moolenaar, Mr. Bergman, Mr. Thompson of California, Ms. Brownley, Mr. Ryan, Ms. Stefanik, Mr. Huizenga, Mr. Kilmer, Mr. Costa, and Mr. Takano) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Agricultural Research, Extension, and Education Reform Act of 1998 to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to waive the matching funds requirement under the specialty crop research initiative, and for other purposes.

section.header: Matching funds waiver under specialty crop research initiative
section.text: Section 412(g)(3) of the Agricultural Research, Extension, and Education Reform Act of 1998 (7 U.S.C. 7632(g)(3)) is amended by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: With respect to a grant awarded under this section on or after the date of enactment of this subparagraph, the Secretary may waive the matching funds requirement under subparagraph (A).
